name: Template Lifecycle Manager
description: Workflow to manage template lifecycle operations including updating templates, deprecating old versions, managing metadata, quality checks, and usage reports.

trigger.description: Trigger for manual operations on templates.

operations.name: Update Template
operations.description: Update existing templates with new content or metadata.

operations.name: Deprecate Old Versions
operations.description: Mark old versions of templates as deprecated.

operations.name: Manage Template Metadata
operations.description: Add or update metadata for templates.

operations.name: Run Quality Checks
operations.description: Perform quality checks on templates to ensure standards.

operations.name: Generate Usage Reports
operations.description: Generate reports on template usage and performance.
